remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些方法绕过系统音频输入，并将文本提供给识别器作为 对象或 对象的数组。These methods bypass the system audio input and provide text to the recognizer as objects or as an array of objects. 这在测试或调试应用程序或语法时非常有用。This can be helpful when you are testing or debugging an application or grammar. 例如，您可以使用模拟来确定单词是否在语法中，以及在识别字词时返回的语义。For example, you can use emulation to determine whether a word is in a grammar and what semantics are returned when the word is recognized. 使用 方法可在仿真操作期间禁用语音识别引擎的音频输入。Use the method to disable audio input to the speech recognition engine during emulation operations. 语音识别器引发 、、和 事件，就像未模拟识别操作一样。The speech recognizer raises the , , , and events as if the recognition operation is not emulated. 识别器忽略新行和额外的空格，并将标点符号视为文本输入。The recognizer ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input. > [!NOTE] > 语音识别器为响应仿真输入而生成的 对象的 属性值为 "`null`"。The object generated by the speech recognizer in response to emulated input has a value of `null` for its property. 若要模拟异步识别，请使用 方法。To emulate asynchronous recognition, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将更改同步到识别器。Use this method to synchronize changes to the recognizer. 例如，如果在识别器正在处理输入时加载或卸载语音识别语法，请使用此方法和 事件将应用程序行为与识别器的状态进行同步。For example, if you load or unload a speech recognition grammar while the recognizer is processing input, use this method and the event to synchronize your application behavior with the state of the recognizer. 调用此方法时，识别器将暂停或完成异步操作，并生成 事件。When this method is called, the recognizer pauses or completes asynchronous operations and generates a event. 然后， 事件处理程序可以在识别操作之间修改识别器的状态。A event handler can then modify the state of the recognizer in between recognition operations. 处理 事件时，识别器将暂停，直到事件处理程序返回。When handling events, the recognizer pauses until the event handler returns. > [!NOTE] > 如果在识别器引发 事件之前，识别器的输入已更改，则放弃该请求。If the input to the recognizer is changed before the recognizer raises the event, the request is discarded. 调用此方法时：When this method is called: - 如果识别器未处理输入，则识别器会立即生成 事件。If the recognizer is not processing input, the recognizer immediately generates the event. - 如果识别器正在处理由无声或背景噪音组成的输入，识别器将暂停识别操作并生成 事件。If the recognizer is processing input that consists of silence or background noise, the recognizer pauses the recognition operation and generates the event. - 如果识别器正在处理的输入不包括无声或背景干扰，则识别器完成识别操作，然后生成 事件。If the recognizer is processing input that does not consist of silence or background noise, the recognizer completes the recognition operation and then generates the event. 识别器处理 事件时：While the recognizer is handling the event: - 识别器不处理输入，并且 属性的值保持不变。The recognizer does not process input, and the value of the property remains the same. - 识别器将继续收集输入，并且 属性的值可以更改。The recognizer continues to collect input, and the value of the property can change.
